column5: For those of you looking for an inexpensive camera Canadian Tire has the Hp Photo Smart M425 5 megapixels 3x zoom on sale this week for  $99.99 .  My daughter has one and it works very well.  Mike
Thats a good price at those pix.  Good on ya for posting the savings.
not a bad price! but i didn't like the previous one i had, drained my battery like theres no tomorrow. canon all the way

Kevin I agree its not a Canon which I also have but for some people on this board students,folks on a tight budget or maybe just a spare compact camera its a good bang for the buck.My daughters M425HP is no harder on batteries than my Canon A-530.We need as many members as possible with Digital cameras so they can send us pics which we truly love on the OFC.
Thats the camera i am getting this weeekend. I think its 6MP and I saw it in superstore for the same price. It cant be too bad
Its 5 mega pixels as much as my Canon and you won't be dissapointed my daughter has one it takes great pics.  After your purcahse we want to see fish Pics  MTP
It comes with a special feature that automatically blurs out the background when you take fishing photos.
Don't forget to get pickup the 4GB memory card for $99.99!  You'll need it to hold all those megapixels!
